teams.name: Tiger Champine Giving Club
teams.loan_because: Our uncle was the most giving mean that we knew.  He recently passed away and during his funeral we were blessed to hear of all the volunteering he did to those less fortunate.  We give because he is and will be role model for everyone.  When your time comes it's really about what and who you have affected in life that will matter.  Peace to all and feel free to join this mission with us!
teams.description: To honor a great man who was one of the greatest volunteers we know. He recently passed away and during his funeral we were all inspired to do more for this less fortunate. Feel free to join us as we help our fellow men, women and children around the world!
